siteTitle: Welcome to the Art, Science, and Engineering of Programming
title: Troisième conférence internationale sur l'art, la science et l'ingénierie de la programmation
description: The Art, Science, and Engineering of Programming is a new conference focused on programming topics including the experience of programming. It will take place April 1-4, 2019 in Genova, Italy. The conference is sponsored by ACM SIGPLAN, in cooperation with ACM SIGSOFT. The conference follows the principles of the International Conference on Functional Programming (ICFP).
